name: HexGrow
description:
Two player hotseat game. Winner has the most cells of their color when the board is full. Selections are applied simultaneously.

  • Player Two closes their eyes, while Player One chooses a cell.
  • Player Two opens their eyes and chooses a cell.
  • Both cell selections are evaluated simultaneously.
  • Repeat until board is full.
